testcase.name: User Login to application and updates the firstname under Personal information section
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Login Page.................................................passed When User logs into application with valid credentials......................passed Then User should be logged in...............................................passed Given User navigates to the Firstname field under Personal information section in Accounts Page.passed When User updates and saves the Firstname...................................passed Then User is displayed with success message "Your personal information has been successfully updated.".passed

testcase.name: User orders for a T-shirt and verifies the order history page
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Login Page.................................................passed When User logs into application with valid credentials......................passed Then User should be logged in...............................................passed Given User navigates to the "T-Shirts" section and selects the t-shirt......passed When User completes Tshirt purchase.........................................passed And User navigate back to the Order History Page............................passed Then User should see that his Order is displayed in order history page......passed
